accounts.addFirstAccount: Add your first account by tapping the Add tab below
accounts.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete {{issuer}} ({{name}})?

addAccount.chooseAddMethod: Choose how you want to add a new authentication token
addAccount.scanQrCodeDesc: Use your camera to scan the QR code from your service provider
addAccount.enterSetupKeyDesc: Manually enter the secret key provided by your service
addAccount.qrWebDescription: Camera access for QR scanning is not available in web browsers. Please use the manual entry option below.
addAccount.cameraUnavailableDesc: The camera scanning module could not be loaded. Please use the manual entry option below.
addAccount.cameraPermissionDesc: You need to grant camera permission to scan QR codes. Please enable it in your device settings.
addAccount.qrInfoText: Most services provide a QR code or a setup key when enabling two-factor authentication.
addAccount.manualEntryPermError: Could not request camera permission. Please enter the token manually.

importAccounts.title: Import Accounts
importAccounts.description: Import your accounts from another authenticator app
importAccounts.scanQrCodeDesc: Use your camera to scan the migration QR code from your other authenticator app
importAccounts.importPhotoDesc: Select a photo containing a migration QR code
importAccounts.processingDescription: Analyzing QR code and importing accounts
importAccounts.importFailedDesc: Could not import accounts. The QR code may be invalid or in an unsupported format.
importAccounts.duplicateAccounts: {{count}} accounts were already in your list and were skipped.
importAccounts.duplicateAccountsSingle: 1 account was already in your list and was skipped.
importAccounts.photoPermissionDesc: You need to grant access to your photo library to import photos. Please enable it in your device settings.
importAccounts.photoImportFailedDesc: Could not process the selected photo. Please try another photo or use the QR scanner.
importAccounts.step1: Open your current authenticator app and look for an export or transfer option
importAccounts.step2: Select the option to export via QR code (sometimes called 'migration')
importAccounts.step3: Use this app to scan the QR code displayed on your other device
importAccounts.supportedApps: Supports Google Authenticator, Authy, and others
importAccounts.exitConfirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to exit? Any scanning progress will be lost.

tokenImporter.title: Scan & Import Tokens
tokenImporter.description: Import tokens using QR codes, files, or text
tokenImporter.chooseImportMethod: Choose how you want to import your tokens
tokenImporter.scanQrCodeDesc: Scan a QR code from another authenticator app
tokenImporter.scanQrCodeInstruction: Position QR code within the frame
tokenImporter.importFromFileDesc: Select a backup file from your device
tokenImporter.pasteTextDesc: Paste token data or a secret key
tokenImporter.pasteTextInstructions: Paste your authentication token data below. This can be JSON data from a backup file or an otpauth:// URL.
tokenImporter.processingDesc: Please wait while we process your import
tokenImporter.generalSuccess: Your authentication tokens have been imported successfully
tokenImporter.generalError: There was a problem importing your tokens. Please check your data and try again.
tokenImporter.importTip: You can import tokens from Google Authenticator, Authy, and other compatible authenticator apps that support QR code export.

manualAdd.secretKeyHelper: Enter the secret key provided by the service
manualAdd.missingInfoDesc: Please fill in all required fields
manualAdd.invalidSecretDesc: Secret must be a valid base32 string
manualAdd.tryManualEntry: Try entering your account details manually instead

settings.cloudBackupDesc: Save your tokens to the cloud
settings.exportTokensDesc: Save a backup file of your tokens
settings.importTokensDesc: Restore tokens from a backup file
settings.importFromOtherAppDesc: Import accounts from another authenticator app
settings.aboutText: Onetime Authenticator generates time-based one-time passwords (TOTP) for two-factor authentication.
settings.warningText: Make sure to backup your tokens regularly. If you lose your device without a backup, you might lose access to your accounts.
settings.importSubtitle: Paste your backup JSON data below:
settings.importSuccessDesc: Your authenticator data has been imported
settings.importErrorDesc: An error occurred while importing data
settings.importFailedDesc: Failed to import data. Invalid format.
settings.encryptionEnabledDesc: Your accounts are now stored encrypted. Make sure to back them up.
settings.encryptionDisabledDesc: Your accounts are no longer encrypted. Enable encryption for better security.

qrScanner.invalidQrCodeDesc: The QR code is not a valid authenticator code.
qrScanner.errorProcessingQrDesc: Could not process the QR code.
qrScanner.cameraAccessDenied: Camera access was denied by your browser. Please enable camera access and try again.
